entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:39 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
